author.name: Anugrah Ilhami Rizki
author.bio: A Computer Engineering graduate with hands-on experience in Web Development. Specializing in developing responsive website using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, and developing RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express.js, and relational databases such as PostgreSQL and MySQL. Experienced in some projects such as portfolio website template, visitor management system, and online learning platform.
